description: Comfort food without the price tag!
name: Friday Night Fakeaway Chicken Curry Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Curry: Cut chicken breasts into strips/chinks and add to slow cooker. Add sliced onion and pataks mango curry sauce. Put on lid and cook on high for 1.5hrs.
Curry: After 1.5 hrs add mushrooms and peas to slow cooker put lid back on and cook for a further 30 mins. (You can cook on hob if you prefer which takes about 30 mins).
Fried Rice: Add sesame oil to wok. Once heated add egg and fry for a couple of mins until set. Take out of pan and cut into strips.
Fried Rice: Fry bacon pieces until browned. Add carrots and spring onions and fry until soft. Then add (cooked & cooled) rice and stir well. Add soy sauce. Turn off heat and stir through egg.
Chips: The chips were made by slicing potatoes into chunky chips and frying in a deep fat fryer.
